persona.quote: What? Look, he thinks he's people!
Let's liven things up, Burroughs. Five grams of junk says I can shoot a pina colada off your wife's head.
Yeah, I know it's sexy Woodhouse, that's why I bought ten. Now arrange those by color.
Oh, good, because your opinion matters, and since you seem unclear on the concept, that was sarcasm.
Ants! All over my body, ANTS!!
I'm afraid the lemur got into the pudding cups.
Stop. Shut up. I have to go, and If I find one single dog hair when I get back, I'll... rub sand in your dead little eyes.
